meta_title: What Is a Defect? Definition and Industrial Meaning
meta_description: A defect is a deviation from an asset's optimal state. This guide defines industrial defects and explains their impact on reliability and performance.
title: What Is a Defect? Definition and Industrial Meaning

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is a Defect? Definition and Industrial Meaning

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic close-up of a high-tech industrial bearing being inspected by a maintenance technician using a handheld digital diagnostic tablet. The background shows a clean, modern 2026-era manufacturing floor with automated machinery and soft blue lighting. The technician is a diverse individual wearing professional PPE, including high-visibility gear and protective eyewear. No text or overlays.
